content:
with its sporty look any child would love to wear this jacket it has a comfortable roomy fit intended to be worn over other clothing worked in two colors of sirdar snuggly dk or other comparable dk weight yarn you can complete this design in childs sizes 2 4 6 8 or 10 >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version ca 0348 cadet blue 2 3 3 3 4 balls
cb 0357 burnt orange 2 2 2 3 4 balls
or
ca 0348 cadet blue 345 400 460 525 720 yds
cb 0357 burnt orange 385 455 520 595 815 yds
